com.redhat.rhn.frontend.action.configuration

Class BaseConfigFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.redhat.rhn.frontend.action.configuration.BaseConfigFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ListFilter
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ConfigChannelFilter, ConfigFileFilter, ConfigSystemFilter

    public abstract class BaseConfigFilter
extends java.lang.Object
implements ListFilter
    Allows us to filter config lists. All the concrete class needs to do is provide a list of bean-ready field names (ie, if getFoo() exists in the Dto, "foo" is the field name), and an I18N msg of the form "configfilter.method.<field>", and the base class will do the rest. ConfigFileFilter
